action.action-desc: Mr. Morelle (for himself and Mr. Fitzpatrick) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the standard charitable mileage rate for delivery of meals to elderly, disabled, frail, and at-risk individuals.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Delivering Elderly Lunches and Increasing Volunteer Engagement and Reimbursements Act of 2025 or the DELIVER Act of 2025.

section.header: Increase in standard mileage rate for delivery of meals to elderly, disabled, frail, and at-risk individuals

subsection.text: Subsection (i) of section 170 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking shall be 14 cents per mile and inserting

paragraph.text: except as provided in paragraph (2), 14 cents per mile, and

in the case of use of such an automobile for the delivery of meals to homebound individuals who are elderly, disabled, frail, or at risk, the standard mileage rate used for purposes of sections 162 and 212.

subsection.text: The amendment made by this section shall apply to miles driven on or after the date of the enactment of this Act.
